text: Ten ni ari-chi ni aru, subete no mono wa arrā no yūdearu. Anata gata jishin no naka ni aru mono o, gen wa shite mo mata kakushite mo, arrā wa soreto anata gata o seisan shite ora reru. Arrā wa, oboshimeshi no mono o yurushi, mata oboshimeshi no mono o bassa reru. Arrā wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru
